statements: SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste;
SELECT id, waste_type FROM hazardous_waste ORDER BY generation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill' AND disposal_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT waste_type, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM hazardous_waste GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT id, waste_type, DISPOSAL_METHOD FROM hazardous_waste WHERE generation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste WHERE waste_type='Chemical Waste' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, waste_type, disposal_method FROM hazardous_waste WHERE generation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND disposal_method='Incineration' ORDER BY generation_date;
SELECT waste_type, COUNT(*) AS waste_count FROM hazardous_waste GROUP BY waste_type ORDER BY waste_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste WHERE disposal_method='Landfill' AND disposal_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, generation_date, disposal_date FROM hazardous_waste WHERE waste_type='Radioactive Waste' AND generation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_generation WHERE facility_name='Facility A';
SELECT waste_type, quantity FROM hazardous_waste_generation ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT facility_name FROM hazardous_waste_disposal;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal WHERE disposal_method='Landfill' ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
SELECT id, facility_name, generation_date FROM hazardous_waste_generation LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_generation WHERE waste_type = 'Hazardous' ORDER BY generation_date ASC;
SELECT facility_name, waste_type, quantity FROM hazardous_waste_generation WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY facility_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_waste_disposal FROM hazardous_waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, waste_type, disposal_method FROM hazardous_waste_disposal WHERE disposal_method = 'Incineration' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM hazardous_waste_generation GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_generators;
SELECT id, name, address FROM hazardous_waste_generators WHERE industry_type='Hospital';
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_generators ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, waste_generation_rate FROM hazardous_waste_generators WHERE waste_generation_rate > 100;
SELECT name, address, industry_type FROM hazardous_waste_generators WHERE industry_type='Manufacturing' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_generators WHERE industry_type = 'Chemical' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, address FROM hazardous_waste_generators WHERE waste_generation_rate > 100 ORDER BY waste_generation_rate DESC
SELECT MAX(amount_collected) AS max_amount_collected, generator_id FROM waste_disposal_records GROUP BY generator_id ORDER BY max_amount_collected DESC

SELECT g.name AS generator_name, s.name AS site_name, r.amount_collected FROM hazardous_waste_generators g JOIN waste_disposal_records r ON g.id = r.generator_id JOIN waste_disposal_sites s ON r.site_id = s.id ORDER BY r.amount_collected DESC
SELECT DISTINCT g.industry_type FROM hazardous_waste_generators g JOIN waste_disposal_records r ON g.id = r.generator_id WHERE r.amount_collected > 500
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_generation;
SELECT waste_type, generation_quantity FROM hazardous_waste_generation WHERE generation_quantity > 100;
SELECT location, disposal_capacity FROM waste_disposal_facilities ORDER BY disposal_capacity DESC;
SELECT site_name, generated_waste_type FROM waste_generation_sites WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT disposal_date, disposal_quantity FROM waste_disposal_records WHERE disposal_quantity < 50 ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_generation ORDER BY generation_date DESC, waste_type ASC;
SELECT site_name, generated_waste_type, location FROM waste_generation_sites WHERE location LIKE '%City%' AND generated_waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location, disposal_capacity FROM waste_disposal_facilities WHERE disposal_capacity > 500 ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_records WHERE disposal_quantity > 1000 AND disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT site_name, generated_waste_type, location, disposal_quantity FROM waste_generation_sites JOIN waste_disposal_records ON waste_generation_sites.site_id = waste_disposal_records.waste_id WHERE disposal_quantity < 500;
SELECT id, waste_type, generation_date, quantity_kg FROM hazardous_waste_generation;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE capacity_kg > 1000;
SELECT disposal_date, site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_records JOIN waste_disposal_sites ON waste_disposal_records.disposal_site_id = waste_disposal_sites.site_id;
SELECT report_id, analysis_result FROM waste_analysis_report WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date, impact_level FROM waste_impact_assessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_generation ORDER BY generation_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, location, capacity_kg FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE capacity_kg > 10000;
SELECT waste_id, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal_records WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM waste_analysis_report WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%hazardous%';
SELECT assessment_id, impact_level FROM waste_impact_assessment ORDER BY assessment_date ASC;
